title: DeFi Education Fund files amicus brief over financial privacy concerns in IRS case
description:
In a landmark case that marks the first opportunity for the U.S. Supreme Court to weigh in on the Fourth Amendment rights of cryptocurrency users in the context of IRS investigations, the DeFi Education Fund (DEF) has filed an amicus brief urging the court to consider the unique aspects of crypto technology when evaluating privacy […]

The post DeFi Education Fund files amicus brief over financial privacy concerns in IRS case appeared first on CryptoSlate.
